meanings.definition: Showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise.
meanings.sent1: Her meticulousness work on the project ensured everything was perfect.
meanings.sent2: His meticulousness in organizing his desk made it look neat and tidy.
meanings.sent3: The detective's meticulousness in solving the case led to an unexpected twist.
meanings.sent4: The artist's meticulousness in blending colors created a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef's meticulousness in measuring ingredients resulted in a delicious dish.

meanings.definition: The quality of being meticulous; extreme care and precision.
meanings.sent1: The meticulousness of her handwriting made it easy to read.
meanings.sent2: His meticulousness in following instructions impressed his boss.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's act was a hilarious parody of meticulousness in daily routines.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's meticulousness in grading papers was like a fine-toothed comb.
meanings.sent5: The architect's meticulousness in designing the building ensured its structural integrity.
